plot: The Fall Fashion Show is about to start and Rocco mingles with the models. Clarke sneaks into Forrester Creations to wish Kristen good luck. At the same time he wishes that the world would know that he created the gown Kristen will be wearing. Caroline arrives for her first showing as part of the fashion press. Eric is thankful when Stephanie shows up to offer moral support. Ridge is frustrated that the company is staying in the niche market, but Thorne advises him to give up his plans for a mass marketing scheme. Later, Margo serves as presenter of the fashion display. The showstopper is a hit as is the rest of the show. Kristen accompanies a proud Eric on the runway as he enjoys the raving applause from buyers and reporters.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
